Text: You had one job.
Wait at the inn.
That idiot! Where did he go?

Claire dashes through the darkened Lawless City in
search of her brother.

She asks the passersby as she frantically scans the
streets. There are some who take that as an
opportunity to attack her, but she dispatches them
all.

Following an eyewitness lead, she finds someone lying
on the ground dressed in the same attire as Cid.
No...this can't...

I'm sorry... I'm so sorry, Cid... I never should have
brought you here...

It feels like the regret and remorse are going to
crush her.

As she is being racked by emotion, someone approaches
her from behind.

Were you the one searching for a boy with black hair
and black eyes? A little while ago, I—
I've found him already.
I've found...my dear brother...
That boy doesn't have black hair or black eyes.
Huh?
Who are you?
I've seen two kids that match that description.
Tell me more!

I saw the first one around the time the moon turned
red. He was standing across from a rampaging ghoul
with a grin on his face.

That's not him. My brother's laugh isn't nearly that
creepy.

I saw the second one a little bit ago. He was a
rather unremarkable dark knight.
Where?! Tell me!

One of the Blood Queen's minions attacked him and
carted him off.
The Blood...? Where did they take him?!
Mary looks, up and Claire follows her gaze.
The Crimson Tower...

Your brother is in the Blood Queen's castle—
the Crimson Tower. The vampires intend to
use him as a sacrifice to the Blood Queen.
Sacrifice?

Reviving Elisabeth the Blood Queen from her
thousand-year slumber requires the lifeblood
of a young man.

Wait. I've never heard anything about the Blood Queen
being asleep—

That's because they've been hiding it and biding
their time for this moment.

For a thousand years... For the night when the Red
Moon rises again, granting the vampires tremendous
amounts of power—

Now that you mention it, the moon has been looking
red lately, but...

The Red Moon also affects the slumbering queen.
And with the lifeblood of the sacrifice, she will
surely...

So my brother is in that tower, right? And since you
said "lifeblood," that means he's still alive.

My target is Elisabeth the Blood Queen. I must make
my way to the Crimson Tower.

Which means we're headed to the same place.
Let's work together...um...
Mary. Vampire hunter.
I'm Claire.

Gaining entrance from the surface will be difficult,
but there's another way. Follow me!
You bet! Hold on, Cid!
The Dark Knight Association is overwhelmed.

They rounded up their finest dark knights to mount a
counteroffensive against the ghouls, but the ghouls'
enhanced powers and overwhelming numbers are
gradually wearing down the Association.
It's a lost cause! We have to fall back!
Retreat to the station! Use the roofs!

I didn't give that order! And you call yourselves
dark knights of the Association?!
I ain't risking my neck so you can save face!
We're not paid enough for this suicide mission!
...You cowards!
Captain! We can't hold the main street any longer!

Just then, the barricade is destroyed, and ghouls
come flooding in.
Agh...
Huh?!
The ghoul before her is instantaneously annihilated.
If you want to live, then flee...
The rampage is starting...
Who are you?

My name is Shadow... I lurk in the darkness and hunt
down shadows.
Y-You mean the wanted criminal?!
The Red Moon... There isn't much time left.
Not much time at all...
